Reviews.Title: Communication with Seller
Reviews.Author: awritervaate
Reviews.Content: I had a problem on my end where I could not find the 4gb card in the packaging-upon my neg eval I was contacted by seller who listed the sale and he immediately apologised and sent a replacement free.  I then within the hour located the missing 4gb card. I immediately called and advised the seller not to mail replacement- however he was addressing the label.  I offered to pay-he declined and sent the card for free.  this immediate response and generosity for my error insures my loyalty as a customer for life. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: All in one
Reviews.Author: Noelia
Reviews.Content: I received it really fast. I was happy with the product because it came with several items. I did not have to buy anything separately
